column3: Personal data can flow freely from the EU to a third country with an Adequacy Decision without any further safeguard being necessary.
column9: Transfer from EU to a third country. Third country has Adequacy Decision.

column3: A legally binding and enforceable instrument between public authorities or bodies
column9: Transfer from EU to a third country. Third country has no Adequacy Decision. Third country has appropriate safeguards. Transfer does not require specific authorisation from a Supervisor Authority.
Transfer from EU to a third country. Third country has no Adequacy Decision. Third country has appropriate safeguards. Transfer does not require specific authorisation from a Supervisor Authority.

column2: Art 46(2-c) Standard Contractual Clauses (SCC) by EC
column3: Standard data protection clauses adopted by the Commission
column9: Transfer from EU to a third country. Third country has no Adequacy Decision. Third country has appropriate safeguards. Transfer does not require specific authorisation from a Supervisor Authority.

column2: Art 46(2-d) Standard Contractual Clauses (SCC) by DPA
column3: Standard data protection clauses adopted by a Supervisory Authority
column9: Transfer from EU to a third country. Third country has no Adequacy Decision. Third country has appropriate safeguards. Transfer does not require specific authorisation from a Supervisor Authority

column3: An approved code of conduct pursuant to GDPR Article 40 together with binding and enforceable commitments of the controller or processor in the third country to apply the appropriate safeguards, including as regards individuals´ rights
column9: Transfer from EU to a third country. Third country has no Adequacy Decision. Third country has appropriate safeguards. Transfer does not require specific authorisation from a Supervisor Authority.

column3: An approved certification mechanism pursuant to GDPR Article 42 together with binding and enforceable commitments of the controller or processor in the third country to appy the appropriate safeguards, including as regards individuals` rights
column9: Transfer from EU to a third country. Third country has no Adequacy Decision. Third country has appropriate safeguards. Transfer does not require specific authorisation from a Supervisor Authority.

column3: Contractual clauses with controller, processor or recipient of the personal data in the third country or the international organisation.
column9: Transfer from EU to a third country. Third country has no Adequacy Decision. Appropriate safeguards exist. Transfer does requires specific authorisation from a Supervisor Authority.

column3: Provisions to be inserted into administrative arrangements between public authorities or bodies which include enforceable and effective data subject rights
column9: Transfer from EU to a third country. Third country has no Adequacy Decision. Appropriate safeguards exist. Transfer does requires specific authorisation from a Supervisor Authority.

column3: The data subject has explicitly consented to the proposed transfer, after having been informed of the possible risks of such transfers for the data subject due to the absence of an adequacy decision and appropriate safeguards.
column9: Transfer from EU to a third country. Third country has no Adequacy Decision. Appropriate safeguards do not exist.

column3: The transfer is necessary for the performance of a contract between the data subject and controller or the implementation of pre-contractual measures taken at the data subject´s request.
column9: Transfer from EU to a third country. Third country has no Adequacy Decision. Appropriate safeguards do not exist.

column3: The transfer is necessary for the conclusion or performance of a contract concluded in the interest of the data subject and controller and another natural or legal person.
column9: Transfer from EU to a third country. Third country has no Adequacy Decision. Appropriate safeguards do not exist.

column3: The transfer is necessary for important reasons of public interest.
column9: Transfer from EU to a third country. Third country has no Adequacy Decision. Appropriate safeguards do not exist.

column3: The transfer is necessary for the establishment, exercise or defence of legal claims.
column9: Transfer from EU to a third country. Third country has no Adequacy Decision. Appropriate safeguards do not exist.

column3: The transfer is necessary in order to protect the vital interests of the data subject or of other persons, where the person is physically or legally incapable of giving consent.
column9: Transfer from EU to a third country. Third country has no Adequacy Decision. Appropriate safeguards do not exist.

column3: The transfer is made from a register which according to Union or Member State law is intended to provide information to the public in general or by any person who can demonstrate a legitimate interest, but only to the extent that the conditions laid down by Union or Member State law for consultation are fulfilled in the particular case.
column9: Transfer from EU to a third country. Third country has not Adequacy Decision. Appropriate safeguards do not exist.

column3: The transfer is not repetetive, concerns only a limited number of data subjects, is necessary for the purposes of compelling legitimate interests pursued by controller which are not overridden by the interests or rights and freedoms of the data subject, and controller has assessed all the circumstances surrounding the data transfer and have on the basis of that assessment provided suitable safeguards with regard to the protection of personal data.
column9: Transfer from EU to a third country. Third country has no Adequacy Decision. Appropriate safeguards do not exist and no other options apply.
